title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
created_time: December 28, 2022, 03:14:10 PMLast edit: December 28, 2022, 04:49:20 PM by Fullbear2222
content: Again about Satoshi Why the world economic expert and menthor told that Satoshi is Putin and If we find out Putin created btc so btc Will go Zero.AS we know Dan pena Are one the well known financial analytics and his very wealthy one If the world richest Person when he say something it Has point.So where and why Dan pena was learning about btc ? Does Dan pena knows something about btc What Dan pena think about btc lighting techology ? Do you think Dan pena think ethereum Will over take btc ?

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 28, 2022, 03:14:10 PMWhy the world economic expert and menthor told that Satoshi is Putin and If we find out Putin created btc so btc Will go Zero.Firstly, nobody is world economic expert here, when it comes about markets everyone just gives their own opinions and they may change again when the markets change.Secondly, if Putin is satoshi, btc would not be here at all. So just forget about him. I'd say lets test Putin to make another coin like BTC, Im sure he got no knowledge about the btc code and other tech stuffs, he'll fail.Thirdly, its mentor not menthor.Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 28, 2022, 03:14:10 PMAS we know Dan penaSorry, but who the F* is this Dan pena now? lol.

comments.author: knowngunman
comments.body: I find it very difficult to understand your grammar thou but whatever you're trying to say, let me make it short for you... Btc will never go zero no matter the circumstances and even if it is possible for ethereum to overtake btc, I don't see that happening anytime soon. Forget about the economic expert and focus on what you believe.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 28, 2022, 03:14:10 PMSo where and why Dan pena was learning about btc ? Does Dan pena knows something about btc What Dan pena think about btc lighting techology ? Do you think Dan pena think ethereum Will over take btc ?Searching about Dan Pena I found this video:BITCOIN GOING TO ZEROhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mMpAREXD6f8He claims he knows who is behind bitcoin and he says when that information comes to the public then bitcoin will be worth zero. So, answering your questions I would say Dan Pena knows zero about bitcoin, he is too old and closed mind to understand the technology behind bitcoin and lighting. And someone who claims that Bitcoin will be worth zero is a waste of time. Is the same as talking with those guys who think the earth is flat.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: Why do you ask us what Dan Pena thinks? We are not in his mind to know what he thinks. Satoshi is no longer relevant to bitcoin, so lets not bring him up as if he has any significant importance.

comments.author: DiMarxist
comments.body: I was captured by your topic or subject QuoteAgain Satoshi let's talk, that is an apostrophe, you are talking to someone that is absent. Base on the OP, I also made some research on Google and I came up with this Dan PeÃ±a Is Wrong About Bitcoin! (And Thatâ€™s Why He Is Brilliant). Dan made these allegations because BTC was not created by American scholars. I was discussing with a friend last week and he told me that BTC was created by Russians and Chinese. So to some extent Dan knows that the creator not BTC is from Russia and not America so to pinpoint his argument, he has to finger point Putin as the creator of the coin, but that is wrong. The creator of BTC is unknown (anonymous). Accusation is heavier than Beating

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Why will Dan Pena be banking on ETH to take over BTC when it's more obvious that ETH was created by a Russian developer?I doubt he is sure about Putin being Satoshi. But because his Wallstreet business is shaken, he wears his tinfoil hat to drag Putin. He has to blame it on someone. It went viral for a while when he spoke about it lol. Maybe he is right or maybe not.

comments.author: inthelongrun
comments.body: So OP can you tell us and explain to us who and why Dan PeÃ±a's opinion matters to us in thousand words? I had to google him. Is he really one of the world's richest people? He is not even a billionaire, right? There are nearly a thousand people that are billionaires and I believe Dan PeÃ±a is not one of them. Actually, I do not even care much about Elon Musk's crypto opinion so I don't see someone that believes Putin is Satoshi Nakamoto worthy of my time. OP I am actually more interested in your trading advice. Hopefully, you will give us a free signal on when to attack big.ðŸš€ðŸš€ðŸš€

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 28, 2022, 03:14:10 PMIf the world richest Person when he say something it Has point.No.Â  There are many Billionaires who have dumb points.Â  Wealth means nothing.Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 28, 2022, 03:14:10 PMDo you think Dan pena think ethereum Will over take btc ?What is this kind of question whether we think he thinks about something.Â  Who cares.Â  I never even heard about this Dan guy.Â  Stop looking at these guys as if they were some prophets.Â  All of them utterly fail and are proven wrong.Conspiracy theories are fun.Â  But do not take their words for granted, take it all just for your entertainment.-Regards,PrivacyG

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 28, 2022, 03:14:10 PMAgain about Satoshi Why the world economic expert and menthor told that Satoshi is Putin and If we find out Putin created btc so btc Will go Zero.AS we know Dan pena Are one the well known financial analytics and his very wealthy one If the world richest Person when he say something it Has point.So where and why Dan pena was learning about btc ? Does Dan pena knows something about btc What Dan pena think about btc lighting techology ? Do you think Dan pena think ethereum Will over take btc ?Hey OP, always put a reference for such news. It seems the news is pretty old, https://coinnounce.com/dan-pena-reveals-the-person-behind-bitcoin-says-it-will-go-to-zero/Ignore Dan Pena! he always tries to make such comments to stay in the spotlight. He is no doubt a charismatic man but I wouldn't say he is an economist or a financial analyst. So there's no need to panic or believe that Putin is behind bitcoin. These are all conspiracy theories so read them, enjoy them and forget about them! That's the best course of action you can take!
